content.text:
# Draft:List of last survivors of historical events

The following is a list of people notable for being documented as the last living individuals to have survived, participated in or witnessed a significant historical event. For inclusion, an individual must have received either historiographical or contemporary coverage about their status as a last survivor of a notable event in world history. Literature about last survivors of historical events has also included the last surviving people associated with historical organizations or phenomena. Examples of individuals who may qualify for inclusion are:
* Participants in or witnesses to political revolutions, civilian conflicts, massacres and assassinations
* Survivors of notable accidents and disasters with mass casualties
* Participants in geographical explorations and scientific breakthroughs
* Participants in or witnesses to historically significant events in culture
* Participants in notable legal proceedings such as trials or the signing of international treaties
* Participants in the activities of defunct governmental, political, cultural or religious organizations
* Participants in or subjects of historical practices, such as people with obsolete occupations or legal statuses
Last surviving veterans of wars and military operations are recorded on separate pages and do not feature in this list. This list also does not include last speakers of languages or last surviving members of families (such as scions of royal families).
Multiple people associated with a singular event are eligible for inclusion if they were members of different historically notable groups within that event (e.g. last defendant and last prosecutor in the Nuremberg Trials).

Images of select individuals
A few of the individuals listed above are pictured here, for visual reference. Each picture is captioned.
File:Millvina dean-april 1999.jpg|Millvina Dean was the last surviving passenger of the  before its sinking in 1912. Pictured in 1999, aged 87.
File:Vaso Cubrilovic.jpg|Vaso Čubrilović was the last surviving conspirator in the Assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand.
File:Buzz Aldrin in 2001.jpg|Buzz Aldrin is the last surviving member of the Apollo 11 crew.
